item.title: This Week at Remap
item.content:encoded:
https://remapradio.com/articles/this-week-at-remap-45/

So we'll have more formal details on this ASAP, but the short version is that we're going to be getting together in person in New York City next week for another in-person stream. Nearly three full days of streaming across Thursday, Friday, and Saturday. And all for a good cause, because we're bringing back Save Point. It's going to be a lot of fun, a lot of things are coming together last minute, but as soon as a few of those things work out, I promise we'll have more concrete info.

-pk, who scheduled his flight back home just in time for football

  • PODCAST: Remap Interview (Home Depot's Skeleton Daddy) – Well, this is it. The big time. I'm so glad I managed to get this interview before I turn 40 next year, because it means I haven't wasted the last four decades. I haven't been able to record as many interviews as I would've liked in recent months, but look, sometimes you make up for all of it in one go. Hope you enjoy this!
  • STREAM: Space Marine 2 – We'll probably play a few hours of Space Marine 2 at the live show, too, but we're going to dip our toes back into our favorite co-op game that we love to complain about at the end because of the gear grind.
  • ARTICLE: Remap Recommends – OK, I'm excited about this one. The idea of a "staff picks" article came up some weeks back and it hasn't left my head, so we're going to pilot a new regular series where, every month, we recommend a game that's lingered in our minds and hearts as the month ends. (Yes, I still want to do a proper Steam Curator thing, too. Stay tuned.) I think there's a possibility we do one that involves what we're watching/listening/reading, too.
  • STREAM: Horror Games – We're still figuring out the what part of this stream, but basically Rob, Patrick, and Cado are gonna get together and get a lil' spooky. Because of my family Halloween obligations, I won't have time to do another nighttime horror stream, but I promise we'll get back to that again.
  • PODCAST: Remap Radio – Janet has finished the new Life Is Strange, and according to the review she wrote, uh, it does not finish well. Welp. No thoughts on the new Dragon Age just yet, but I'm going to start it this week.
  • ARTICLE: Rob & Patrick's Letter Series – Still figuring out the topic for this one, because we tend to write it as the week goes on, but we'll have somethin'.

If you have any support issues, send details on the issue to support@remapradio.com.

Patrick Klepek (he/him) is an editor at Remap. In another life, he worked on horror movie sets, but instead, he also runs Crossplay, a newsletter about parenting and video games. You can follow him on Twitter, Threads, Mastodon, and Bluesky.
